documents.document: @dangergirl101 I just hate we are stuck on the same storyline. That's dragging about Poussey that to us happened a year ago and whole season is a few days
@dangergirl101 It's still a good season and every episode makes you want to watch the next. But just last season in my opinion raised the bar.
Can't believe #BB19 is one week away. That means from now until Christmas I'll be sitting on my couch cuz #survivor after.
@dangergirl101 I watched this season in 2 days and it's my least favorite. If I wanna watch 24 I'll watch 24. Last season was my favorite. #OITNB5
Lets be honest with ourselves. #NashvillePredators color concept always sucked. Cool logo but all yellow sucked #nhl
@emilyelegado Do you get residuals?
And that married couple... I always thought they should have done an #InkMaster couples season.
They should have brought the twins from last season. Would have been interested in seeing them worn together #InkMaster
@ArdaOcalTV But I feel like the Senators should have objected this.
@TorontoPearson @CanBorder I don't give 2 craps about them you guys messed up my schedule. Was supposed to make a quick pickup an hour ago #pearsonairport
@TorontoPearson hey monkeys whats with the delays? My parents have been stuck for over an hour while the plane has landed. #pearsonairport
@dangergirl101 Definitely. A network with a theme. Like HGTV.
@dangergirl101 Yeah and it was known as The First Network for Men or something. The Paramount Network sounds too Hollywood.
@dangergirl101 Yeah The Paramount Network. First it was The Nashville Network then The National Network.
@dangergirl101 Spike has made a lot of weird decisions in the past too. Dating back to their TNN days.
@dangergirl101 Yeah I heard of it. Some said it was less drama and focussed on the art. But I only had time for one show.
@dangergirl101 Like Christian was a "newbie" on season 7 but has over 15 years of Experience.
@dangergirl101 Oh I never watched it. None of them are actually newbies in tattooing. They're just newbies on the show.
@dangergirl101 But honestly a few newbies seem talented this season compared to season 7. Also a few duds of returning players.
@dangergirl101 @mattobaugh I'm actually hoping @DJTambe and that other guy (joking) @bubbairwin make it to finale. They were there from the beginning.
@dangergirl101 Yeah like Matt (who's on this season) and Kelly from last season getting eliminated before showing their finale tattoos. Ridiculous.
@dangergirl101 #InkMaster is one of those shows you can enjoy watching but can also enjoy criticizing all day. Especially on their train wreck finales.
@dangergirl101 Question is how can you have a fan favorite and talent like Tommy Helms and not feature him throughout the season? #InkMaster
@dangergirl101 At least Season 7 they had a theme. They went from order of seasons in reverse for returning artists. From Saint Marq to Vaughan #InkMaster
Damn watched The Founder with Michael Keaton. I feel like #boycott #McDonalds
I don't get when an HOH puts 2 people up not in his alliance and think they have power to send them home. It's up to the house #BB19
I hate to say this but this was probably my favorite episode. More drama more good tv #BB19
Wow Paul really is the puppet master #BB19
It's interesting how this was the most dramatic/explosive week yet it's also a "reset" week #BB19
@WWEdarrylsharma Can we get Heavy Machinery instead? You refs were better wrestlers than @Rezar_WWE & @Akam_WWE. They suck lol @WWENXT #wwenxt
With all of this soap opera drama I forgot there is a veto #BB19
It's #BB19 time #BB19 time...
Umm shouldn't every tattoo have consistency #InkMaster ???

@ryan_connolly I wrote this before the iPhone episode which was released today.

@MattCarterMedia So it can be a a complete King of Queens rip off.
@MattCarterMedia I'm fine with killing off a character but bringing in Leah full time is stupid. Why don't they bring Jerry Stiller while we are at it

@kizgold But this resting. I still haven't seen the ending of the episode so no idea who won it. But one leg is rested do helps balance #BB19

@dangergirl101 @MattCarterMedia I don't think he wants anything to do with that show. He even refused to go to finale.
@dangergirl101 @MattCarterMedia James Danger was another person who for screwed. I think producers planted that canvas Natalie.
@dangergirl101 @MattCarterMedia It could have been an interview with you or another article I found online. It was back in 2012.
@dangergirl101 @MattCarterMedia He said in an interview that he was cast because he had no tattoos.
@dangergirl101 @MattCarterMedia Should always being experts on those challenged to criticise it.
@dangergirl101 @MattCarterMedia If you notice artists get heavily criticized on American Traditional or Japanese cuz Oliver and Nunez are experts on it.
@dangergirl101 @MattCarterMedia In my opinion S4 had a lot of duds but probably the strongest final 4.
@dangergirl101 @MattCarterMedia Yeah Jamie Davies. But I think he got some tattoos now. At least something on his wristor forearm.
@dangergirl101 @MattCarterMedia Master vs Apprentice had head to head challenge first episode and it was blind judging. Was perfect.
@dangergirl101 @MattCarterMedia Remember when Melissa got eliminated S4 at the Final5 despite having a better tattoo then Scott? said it's becuz of her lack of experience
@dangergirl101 @MattCarterMedia House of Monkey may never have been at the bottom but they were still at the bottom half
@dangergirl101 @MattCarterMedia I rather see blind judging on the show. A lot of times they rely on report cards or artists reputation.
Art is so subjective. I liked the art by that couple. Yet Hobo wanted to take is eye out. #InkMaster
I like how the newbies can tell which vets suck #InkMaster
